meanings.definition: To suggest a possible explanation or idea based on limited evidence.
meanings.sent1: She hypothesizes that the missing toy is under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The scientist hypothesizes that the new medicine will cure the disease.
meanings.sent3: Tommy hypothesizes that aliens stole his homework!
meanings.sent4: The detective hypothesizes the suspect's alibi is as flimsy as a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The teacher hypothesizes a magical world where numbers come to life.

meanings.definition: To make an educated guess or assumption.
meanings.sent1: He hypothesizes that it will rain tomorrow based on the dark clouds.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist hypothesizes the age of the artifact based on its design.
meanings.sent3: Sally hypothesizes that eating broccoli will make her invisible!
meanings.sent4: The investor hypothesizes the stock market's behavior like predicting the weather.
meanings.sent5: The child hypothesizes a secret treasure hidden in the backyard.
